page.title: 10TRENT VALLEY FARMS
page.content: There are 3 in this area. 1. BRASSWORKS FARM (52 acres) Mr D.Bendall owns and farms this farm growing grass on the flat land in the Trent Valley. There are 2 workers to help with the dairy cattle and pigs. 2. FURSE FARM (30 acres) Mr C.Bowers owns this farm with light soils on the sand of the River Trent. Dairy cattle are kept and the chief crop is grass. 2 workers help on the farm. 3. REDHOUSE FARM (70 acres) Staffs C. Council owned and farmed by Mr J.Brown. The chief crop is grass & there are heavy soils on gravel and sand of the Trent Valley. The farm has dairy cattle.
